trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanging"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: You can use the data from the InputLanguageChangingEventArgs class to prepare to change Input Method Editors (IME) or swap right-to-left values.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar os dados da classe de InputLanguageChangingEventArgs para se preparar para alterar o método de entrada editores (IME) ou trocar valores para a esquerda.

trans-unit.source: You can also change a thread's <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A> properties so that different resources get picked up.
trans-unit.target: Também pode alterar um thread <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>e <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A>Propriedades de modo a que recursos diferentes obterem selecionados correr</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the input language from changing, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para impedir a linguagem de entrada a alterar, defina o <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: An InputLanguageChangingEventArgs identifies the requested input language and the character set of new input language.
trans-unit.target: Um InputLanguageChangingEventArgs identifica o idioma pedido de entrada e o conjunto de carateres de idioma de entrada novo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs.Culture%2A> property identifies the locale of the requested language.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs.Culture%2A>propriedade identifica a região do idioma pedido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs.Culture%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanging> event precedes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanging>eventos precede o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanging>

trans-unit.source: For information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified locale, character set, and acceptance.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs"> </xref> classe com a região especificado, o conjunto de carateres e a aceitação.

trans-unit.source: The locale of the requested input language.
trans-unit.target: A região do idioma pedido de entrada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the system default font supports the character set required for the requested input language; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o tipo de letra do sistema predefinido suporta o conjunto necessário para o idioma pedido de entrada; de carateres caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified input language, character set, and acceptance of a language change.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs"> </xref> classe com o idioma de entrada especificado, o conjunto de carateres e a aceitação de uma alteração do idioma.

trans-unit.source: The requested input language.
trans-unit.target: O idioma pedido de entrada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the system default font supports the character set required for the requested input language; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o tipo de letra do sistema predefinido suporta o conjunto necessário para o idioma pedido de entrada; de carateres caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: inputLanguage is .
trans-unit.target: inputLanguageis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the locale of the requested input language.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a região do idioma pedido de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs.Culture%2A> property specifies a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that defines a set of user preference information dependent on the user's language, sublanguage, country/region, and cultural conventions.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs.Culture%2A>propriedade especifica um <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>que define um conjunto de informações de preferência de utilizador dependentes de idioma do utilizador, sublanguage, país/região e convenções cultural.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs.Culture%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the locale of the requested input language.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>que especifica a região de idioma de entrada pedida.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the input language.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica o idioma de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The input language.
trans-unit.target: A linguagem de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the system default font supports the character set required for the requested input language.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o tipo de letra do sistema predefinido suporta o conjunto necessário para o idioma pedido de entrada de carateres.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the system default font supports the character set required for the requested input language; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o tipo de letra do sistema predefinido suporta o conjunto necessário para o idioma pedido de entrada; de carateres caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
